# Type alias: SizeChangeEventHandler()

> **SizeChangeEventHandler**: (`width`, `height`) =\> `void`

A custom function used to handle changes to the time scale\'s size.

## Parameters[​](SizeChangeEventHandler.html#parameters "Direct link to Parameters"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Parameters"} {#parameters .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

• **width**: `number`

• **height**: `number`

## Returns[​](SizeChangeEventHandler.html#returns "Direct link to Returns"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Returns"} {#returns .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

`void`
